mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, surname, firstname, dob, email, street, suburb, state, role) VALUES (#{id}, #{surname}, #{firstname}, #{dob}, #{email}, #{street}, #{suburb}, #{state}, #{role});
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET surname= #{surname}, firstname= #{firstname}, dob= #{dob}, email= #{email}, street= #{street}, suburb= #{suburb}, state= #{state} WHERE id= #{id}
